> Log:
> Update mkversion.sh to support git and git-svn checkouts.
> Jerry, did I get you right that you'll merge this to 3_0 yourself?

Or you can.  It's just that the original patch did not
apply to SAMBA_3_0 so I was going to wait for you and
then grab the entire mkversion.sh file.





cheers, jerry
